name: Dungeon Rush (itch) (Voycawojka)
description:
You've found yourself in the middle of a dungeon. Make the best of the situation and collect as much gold as you can!

How to play

  • Arrows - move forward, backward and rotate
  • WASD - move forward, backward and sideways
  • QE - rotate
  • SPACE - toggle shield
  • TAB - wait

Interact with objects and fight by moving into objects and monsters. You don't have HP, instead you loose gold when you're hit. It's not about staying alive, it's about getting as much gold as you can to the exit. 

Find the exit and share your score in the comments!

Fighting tips

  • toggle the shield (SPACE) before waiting (TAB) or moving to avoid an attack
  • the shield is directional so moving sideways (A/D) is extremely useful
  • toggle the shield and move into an enemy or object to push it! This is especially useful when fighting with Mages but only works if there's empty space behind your target
  • enemies display possible actions above their heads and choose randomly between them. When no more actions are possible they rest for one turn to renew their action pool

The game was made in 2 weeks as an exercise.
